name: BDD-006 - slim fit / slim leg.
description: the new slim fit! fabric: *14.7 oz. selvage denim / 100% cotton. *right hand twill. *extra dipped dyed yarns for deep indigo colour. *tight weaving construction for strong touch. specifications: *slim fit top block. *slim legs - slightly tapered. *unwashed - sanforized. *chambray pocketing. *‘big 3 inspired’ coinpocket. *hidden 6th pocket. *hidden rivets at the back pockets. *asymmetrical back pockets. *3 button fly. *3 different yarn colours. *2 types of yarn thickness. *2 types of stitch lengths. *bull’s horns backpocket stitching. *reversed debossed leather patch. *extra lined backpockets. *riveted for durability. *beltloops stitched under waistband. *clean lapseam at the inseams. *union special 43200g chainstitched hems. *made in okayama, japan. for additional info and pictures, please go to the bdd website. by purchasing you agree with the bdd terms & conditions.

name: BDD-710 - regular fit / tapered leg.
description: the new regular tapered fit! fabric: *14.7 oz. selvage denim / 100% cotton. *left hand twill. *greencast colour reproduced from deadstock fabric. *zimbabwe cotton. specifications: *regular fit top block. *tapered legs. *unwashed - sanforized. *chambray pocketing. *‘big 3 inspired’ coinpocket. *hidden 6th pocket. *hidden rivets at back pocket. *asymmetrical back pockets. *4 button fly. *3 different yarn colours. *2 types of yarn thickness. *2 types of stitch lengths. *bull’s horns backpocket stitching. *reversed debossed leather patch. *extra lined backpockets. *riveted for durability. *beltloops stitched under waistband. *clean lapseam at the inseams. *union special 43200g chainstitched hems. *made in okayama, japan. for additional info and pictures, please go to the bdd website. by purchasing you agree with the bdd terms & conditions.
